DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to assess comparative gastrointestinal tolerance of normal term infants to various milk-protein infant formulas.
DOC.brief_title: Tolerance of Healthy Term Infants Fed Infant Formulas
DOC.criteria: Healthy, term infants; singleton birth; 3742 weeks of age; >2490gms at birth; 08 days of age medications/foods/formulas affecting GI tolerance;adverse medical history with possible effect on tolerance or growth
